Package com.jme3.renderer.opengl

Interface GLES_30

All Superinterfaces:
GL
All Known Implementing Classes:
AndroidGL, IosGL
public interface GLES_30 extends GL
GL functions and constants only available on vanilla OpenGL ES 3.0.
